mapper.select: select EMP_INDEX,EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_ADDRESS, EMP_PHONE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_PHOTO, EMP_ENTRY_DATE, EMP_RANK_INDEX, RANK_NAME, DEPT_NAME,EMP_TEAM_INDEX,TEAM_NAME, EMP_POSITION_INDEX,POSITION_NAME, EMP_BANK_NAME, EMP_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EMP_VACATION, EMP_SALARY e from emp,rank,dept,team,position where emp.emp_rank_index = rank.rank_index and emp.emp_team_index = team.team_index and team.team_dept_index= dept.dept_index and emp.emp_position_index = position.position_index and emp.EMP_INDEX =#{EMP_INDEX}
